content: this hat is perfect for so many reasons it s made using a beautiful daisy stitch with a pom pom on top and it has a ribbed trim around the bottom but the best part is the color the beanie is worked in a 100% merino wool yarn in a beautiful silver this shade is so stunning it s subtle and fun click here for an ad-free printable pdf of this pattern 1 1 https //makerdrop com/products/beanie-crochet-pattern
